channel.title: Toledo on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning
channel.description: Recent content in Toledo on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning

item.title: Tama-Toledo: 17th Street at US 63 (9d)
item.description: This plan, 9d, designated for participation by both communities, includes a pedestrian crossing of busy US 63 at 17th Street in Tama, and sidewalk access along US 63 and 17th Street connecting the STC campus to northern portions of Tama’s sidewalk network, Tama’s Oak Park, southern portions of Toledo’s sidewalk network, and the STC Administration Building. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; display: none; } #paginator { display: none; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } #loadingWrapper { display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 350px; } #loading { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 3px solid #d2d0d0;; border-radius: 50%; border-top-color: #383838; animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; -webkit-animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @-webkit-keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } Previous Next     Page: / window.

item.title: Toledo: Broadway at Business 30 (10a)
item.description: This is PLAN Toledo-Broadway-at-Lincoln-Hwy.md with an initial cost estimate included. Note that the estimate for 2300 square feet of concrete trail, 8 feet in width, is equivalent to 2300 sf / 8 ft = 287.5 lineal feet of trail. The last page of the PLAN is estimated cost for a 6-foot-wide sidewalk connecting the S. Broadway/Lincoln Highway intersection to Toledo’s existing sidewalk network at the northeast corner of Mill Street and S.

item.title: Toledo: Connection Plan (10b)
item.description: This plan, 10b, is an overall pedestrian connection plan for Toledo. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; display: none; } #paginator { display: none; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } #loadingWrapper { display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 350px; } #loading { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 3px solid #d2d0d0;; border-radius: 50%; border-top-color: #383838; animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; -webkit-animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @-webkit-keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } Previous Next     Page: / window.

item.title: Toledo: 2nd Street at US 63 (10c)
item.description: This is PLAN Toledo-2nd-Street-at-US-63.md. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; display: none; } #paginator { display: none; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } #loadingWrapper { display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 350px; } #loading { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 3px solid #d2d0d0;; border-radius: 50%; border-top-color: #383838; animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; -webkit-animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @-webkit-keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } Previous Next     Page: / window.

item.title: Toledo: High Street at US 63 (10d)
item.description: This plan, 10d, presents a Tactical Urbanism   option (page 2) and a more complex/expensive permanent streetscape option (page 3) for safety improvements at the High Street / US 63 intersection in Toledo. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; display: none; } #paginator { display: none; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } #loadingWrapper { display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 350px; } #loading { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 3px solid #d2d0d0;; border-radius: 50%; border-top-color: #383838; animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; -webkit-animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @-webkit-keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } Previous Next     Page: / window.

item.title: Toledo: Downtown (10e)
item.description: This plan, 10e, presents a Tactical Urbanism   option (page 2) and a more complex/expensive permanent streetscape option (page 3) for renovation of Downtown Toledo. #the-canvas { border: 1px solid black; direction: ltr; width: 100%; height: auto; display: none; } #paginator { display: none; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } #loadingWrapper { display: none; justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 350px; } #loading { display: inline-block; width: 50px; height: 50px; border: 3px solid #d2d0d0;; border-radius: 50%; border-top-color: #383838; animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; -webkit-animation: spin 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } @-webkit-keyframes spin { to { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); } } Previous Next     Page: / window.
